user.description:
## Webconnect
Devices that supports the webconnect standard. Many SMA devices from end of 2014 to 2023. (e.g. Sunny Tripower Smart Energy, Sunny Boy Storage)

## EnnoxOS
Newer devices from SMA from approx. 2023. (e.g. Tripower X, EVCharger)

## Speedwire Energymeter
Sunny Home Manager 2 as well Energymeter 10/20

## Speedwire
Almost all SMA devices with a network connection. Only unencrypted communication is supported. The password for the account "user" can be set using the Sunny Explorer Software

Special case ennexOS:

The measured values are supplied in two parts. Once for the device (IGULD:SELF) and once for the whole plant (Plant:1). They may also mirror the data from the energy meters (EM:0174-XXXXXXXXXX).

init.description:
After a change, HA must be restarted manually.

Values of less than 5 seconds significantly increase the load for HA and can overload slow computers.
In any case, please specify deactivate any sensors that are not required.
